attributes.action: SUPPORT THE RURAL LIFE AND PEOPLE OF BRITAIN
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: THIS GOVERNMENT HAS OVER THE PAST 10YRS CLOSED MORE RURAL POST OFFICES AND SEEN MORE RURAL PUBS CLOSE THEN EVER BEFORE. IT HAS SEEN RURAL TRANSPORT DECLINE TO ITS WORST EVER. ITS ABOUT TIME THIS GOVERNMENT MADE RURAL BRITIAN A TOP PRIORITY BEFORE WE END UP HAVING NO FARMING OR RURAL ACTIVITY AT ALL.

rejection.details: Please rewrite in upper and lower case.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
